Abigor Lance.name: Abigor Lance
Abigor Lance.description: "''A magic lance that shows its owner the near future and destroys victims from within.''"

Adamas.name: Adamas
Adamas.description:
"''This sickle is made from the world's hardest metal and boasts fearsome sharpness.
It can shred anything imaginable - even space-time itself.''"

Aegir.name: Aegir
Aegir.description:
"It is said that a single magical arrow from this bow can sink a ship.
Those sunken ships are said to display a mark akin to a beast's bite."

Aeglos.name: Aeglos
Aeglos.description:
"A spear supposedly made of a magic icicle from an uninhabitable cold land.
Those who are pierced by it will freeze to death."

Amulet of Desire.name: Amulet of Desire
Amulet of Desire.description:
"An ancient arcane weapon that grants all wishes.
A long war broke out over this very amulet."

Aphoom Club.name: Aphoom Club
Aphoom Club.description: "''A strike from this ominous hammer feels like burning heat and the death pangs of its former victims.''"
Aphoom Club.obtained: [[Creeping Flames of Madness (7th Raid Battle)|Creeping Flames of Madness]]

Aphros Beauty.name: Aphros Beauty
Aphros Beauty.description: "The goddess of beauty's bow, its exploding water arrows look like shimmering jewels."

Aqua Bardiche.name: Aqua Bardiche
Aqua Bardiche.description: "A sickle cursed by those who died of thirst. Its blade is pressurized water."

Armageddon Lance.name: Armageddon Lance
Armageddon Lance.description:
"A lance that was unrivaled in the final battle recorded in the Apocalypse.
It can pierce the heavens with one blow and scatters darkness."

Avaricious Grimoire.name: Avaricious Grimoire
Avaricious Grimoire.description: "A sacred tome in which was silently laid a perfect sorcery sought after by all sorcerers and superior to all others."

Ba'al Zebub's Rod.name: Ba'al Zebub's Rod
Ba'al Zebub's Rod.description:
"''A great being considered either demon or a god depending on the religion.
The staff is said to have the same tremendous might as its master.''"

Backdraft.name: Backdraft
Backdraft.description: "Causing a huge explosion of flames when touched, this ancient weapon is a symbol of catastrophic fires."

Belthronding.name: Belthronding
Belthronding.description:
"''A bow that uses the super composite armor of Oberon's wings.
its arrows fly to the ends of the earth with magic of wind.''"

Black Crow Bow.name: Black Crow Bow
Black Crow Bow.description: "A bow that embodies the guidance of the sun. Its arrows are like meteors."

Black Feathered Hatchet.name: Black Feathered Hatchet
Black Feathered Hatchet.description: "A hatchet that embodies the demise of the sun. Its crystalized flames send enemies to meet eternity."

Blade of Divine Punishment.name: Blade of Divine Punishment
Blade of Divine Punishment.description: "''A sword that delivers divine punishment. It extends limitlessly with magic and can slice warships in two with one stroke.''"

Blade of Guilty Lust.name: Blade of Guilty Lust
Blade of Guilty Lust.description: "''A sword of lust. It gives its owner unbelievable vitality, but robs him of self control.''"
Blade of Guilty Lust.obtained: [[Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Lust]]

Bloody Roses.name: Bloody Roses
Bloody Roses.description: "A bow that shoots death roses. The arrows suck up life force."

Bolt Hammer Ukonvasara.name: Bolt Hammer Ukonvasara
Bolt Hammer Ukonvasara.description:
"A legendary hammer said to have been used by Raijin.
While the truth remains a mystery, the hammer's godly strength perpetuates the legend."

Book of R'lyeh.name: Book of R'lyeh
Book of R'lyeh.description: "A magic book that could give you the power of an evil god or drive you insane."

Bow of Light Europa.name: Bow of Light Europa
Bow of Light Europa.description:
"A powerful bow that flings arrows of bullfighting strength, contradicting its holy shine.
Its arrows can easily pierce boulders."

Brutal Lance Typhoeus.name: Brutal Lance Typhoeus
Brutal Lance Typhoeus.description:
"An enmorous lance that burns down all in its path.
It is modeled after Typhon and instills fear and despair in those who oppose it."

Caduceus.name: Caduceus
Caduceus.description: "''The tremendous magic concealed within this staff whips up winds that brings the comfort of death.''"

Caladbolg.name: Caladbolg
Caladbolg.description:
"This razor sharp telescopic weapon that strikes its foes with lightning.
However, it is so extremely difficult to handle that those who can, are few."

Cannon of Light Feathers.name: Cannon of Light Feathers
Cannon of Light Feathers.description:
"A gun made with feathers of light containing concentrated phoenix power.
Its might is suitable for a cannon."

Caudimordax.name: Caudimordax
Caudimordax.description:
"A legendary dragon slayer,
it is sometimes mistaken for a magic sword due to its slaughtering powers suggesting that it has a mind of its own."

Celestial Staff.name: Celestial Staff
Celestial Staff.description:
"''A star-shaped weapon said to have been left behind by a
sage. This staff retains memories of now little-know stars.''"

Chakram Lance.name: Chakram Lance
Chakram Lance.description: "''Master this special lance's rotating blades and thunder magic to defeat any enemy.''"

Conquista Bow.name: Conquista Bow
Conquista Bow.description: "A rapid-fire bow that mercilessly subjugates its targets."

Cursed Sword Gleipnir.name: Cursed Sword Gleipnir
Cursed Sword Gleipnir.description:
"The cursed may be the wielder of this sword.
It bears the sorrow of both itself and its wielder and emits thunder power."

Death Reaper.name: Death Reaper
Death Reaper.description: "An ax that's taken many lives, it contains souls that drive its wielder insane."

Demon Baselard.name: Demon Baselard
Demon Baselard.description:
"''Its blade contains the power of violent currents.
Only the most powerful and favored by water can wield it.''"

Demonic Sword Lucifer.name: Demonic Sword Lucifer
Demonic Sword Lucifer.description:
"This blade with the tremendous power of darkness was bequeathed by a demon.
Passed on from demon to human, it can shred even sacred light."

Deva Bow.name: Deva Bow
Deva Bow.description:
"''A bow of comet flames. Its arrows awaken the base
instincts of those they strike, searing them with desire.''"

Divine Moonlight Bow.name: Divine Moonlight Bow
Divine Moonlight Bow.description: "''A bow imbued with a moon goddess' power that fires magic "rangeless arrows" made of light that pierce their target regardless of distance.''"

Dragon Slasher Garm.name: Dragon Slasher Garm
Dragon Slasher Garm.description:
"A consecrated sword bestowed by the gods upon a knight. The blessing it enshrines is akin to a curse.
Its blade can easily slaughter even dragons."

Dragonic Tail.name: Dragonic Tail
Dragonic Tail.description: "''A spear with [[Crom Cruach]]'s cloned tail. It shoots red hot fire.''"
Dragonic Tail.obtained: Raging Fury of the Inferno Dragon

Dragon's Pearl.name: Dragon's Pearl
Dragon's Pearl.description:
"A jewel said to have been formed in the body of a dragon.
With dragon's magic, it grants its possessor absolute power."

Dragvandil.name: Dragvandil
Dragvandil.description:
"A famous sword said to have been wielded by the chief of a tribe that cross and live by the sea.
The sword is proof of the ruler of the sea."

Dramborleg.name: Dramborleg
Dramborleg.description:
"As sharp as a sword and as destructive as a hammer,
this miraculous axe combines two opposing forces with the power of water."

Draupnir.name: Draupnir
Draupnir.description: "''The firearm Baldr entrusted to Hermod. It was originally an arcane weapon but was remodeled as a gun for bombat use..''"

Eckesachs.name: Eckesachs
Eckesachs.description:
"A self-regenerating sword. It is sharpened so its blade never chips.
Its blade spews red-hot flames."

Edge King.name: Edge King
Edge King.description:
"A razor-edged sword clad in flames.
With this its only claim, it is of no significant fame, but its might is fearsome."

Electric Blade Beidana.name: Electric Blade Beidana
Electric Blade Beidana.description:
"A one-handed sword that rains thunder and lightning on surroundings.
Although extremely dangerous, it does not electrocute its wielder."

Elemental Lance.name: Elemental Lance
Elemental Lance.description: "''This lance imparts transfiguration to those who are loyal and peaceful. It has the power to foresee one's fate and can protect its holder from valamity.''"

Elijah Ballista.name: Elijah Ballista
Elijah Ballista.description:
"A bow that moves as if it can predict enemies' next moves and shoots them to death.
Foes fall before the god of thunder as no one can escape its lightning arrows."

Emperor Lance.name: Emperor Lance
Emperor Lance.description: "''The king of abyss' lance. It can blow anything away with the power of the sea.''"
Emperor Lance.obtained: [[Creeping Flames of Madness (7th Raid Battle)|Creeping Flames of Madness]]

Execution Axe.name: Execution Axe
Execution Axe.description:
"''An axe protected by hell fire. Its blade will
never dull in the hands of an evil wielder.''"

Fairy Prelude.name: Fairy Prelude
Fairy Prelude.description:
"This staff was carved from a legendary tree.
Its great wind power could envelope the entire world."

False Grail Yaldabaoth.name: False Grail Yaldabaoth
False Grail Yaldabaoth.description:
"A chalice born of a group who traded their lives for their wishes to be granted by the gods.
It produces pseudo-godlike power and brings about miracles."

Fire Bow Guilty Wrath.name: Fire Bow Guilty Wrath
Fire Bow Guilty Wrath.description:
"''A demonic bow imbued with blazing wrath.
A weak wielder would be consumed by it's raging fire.''"
Fire Bow Guilty Wrath.obtained: [[Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Wrath]]

Fire Lance Langdebeve.name: Fire Lance Langdebeve
Fire Lance Langdebeve.description:
"A lance that through magic embodied the horror and screams of people engulfed in flames.
Its power induces fear and despair."

Fire Javelin Brionac.name: Fire Javelin Brionac
Fire Javelin Brionac.description:
"When thrown, this lance incinerates foes at the speed of light.
It is said to have been used in a battle between a powerful god and demon."

Fire Spreader Warpick.name: Fire Spreader Warpick
Fire Spreader Warpick.description:
"This weapon concentrates its striking force at one point and hammers flames at foes.
This ancient warpick spreads fire and annihilates all things."

Flamea Parasol.name: Flamea Parasol
Flamea Parasol.description:
"A spear when closed, and a parasol when open.
It's also Brynhildr's summer SPF protection."

Fomalhaut Bow.name: Fomalhaut Bow
Fomalhaut Bow.description: "''A large bow name for a star. The hellfire it shoots could even kill a god.''"
Fomalhaut Bow.obtained: [[Creeping Flames of Madness (7th Raid Battle)|Creeping Flames of Madness]]

Fraken.name: Fraken
Fraken.description:
"This weapon can whip up winds with one blow and storms with two.
Its wind-laden blade can be called the embodiment of nature."

Frostbite Lance Sarissa.name: Frostbite Lance Sarissa
Frostbite Lance Sarissa.description: "An ancient lance that freezes foes from the inside by the wound it inflicts, freezing even their hopes."

Fulgur Shooter.name: Fulgur Shooter
Fulgur Shooter.description:
"Its bullets encase lightning bolts that shock their targets with hundreds of millions of volts.
To wield this gun is to hold a thunder god's power."

Gae Bolg.name: Gae Bolg
Gae Bolg.description: "Cu Chulainn's legendary spear, master its many features and you could defeat a whole army."

Gale Recurve Bow.name: Gale Recurve Bow
Gale Recurve Bow.description:
"A bow carrying the power of fatal raging winds.
It attracts those possessed by the madness of destruction."

Galt Chakram.name: Galt Chakram
Galt Chakram.description:
"A magic sword carved with the seal of a god bird monarch.
Its attacks are accompanied with wind and slice all matter."

Gambanteinn.name: Gambanteinn
Gambanteinn.description:
"A legendary staff that nullifies all magic.
It accumulates all this magic and can shoot it in the form of flames."

Garuda Deva.name: Garuda Deva
Garuda Deva.description:
"A large hammer that looks as if a duplicate of a divine bird.
It blasts away foes as if they were dust."

Gjallarhorn.name: Gjallarhorn
Gjallarhorn.description:
"A horn that signals the arrival of Ragnarok.
It reacts to the power of Ragnarok, rendering all matter into smithereens with its sound."

God Destroyer Gaia Force.name: God Destroyer Gaia Force
God Destroyer Gaia Force.description:
"An ancient scientist sought the power of the stars, equal to that of the gods.
His hammer contains the glimmer of stars and breath of the gods."

God Flame Gun.name: God Flame Gun
God Flame Gun.description: "A legendary holy relic with godlike power that could burn the world to ash."

God Hand.name: God Hand
God Hand.description:
"A hammer that represents the fury of the gods.
Those who witness its blows no longer defy the gods out of fear."

Goibniu Hammer.name: Goibniu Hammer
Goibniu Hammer.description: "Among the many durable hammers, only the Goibniu Hammer can regenerate itself, making it indestructible."

Gold Axe.name: Gold Axe
Gold Axe.description:
"''This giant axe's sharp end can split open even the earth.
The waters that spew forth deliver a powerful attack.''

Gridarvol.name: Gridarvol
Gridarvol.description:
"This mysterious weapon is both a first-class staff and club.
It bludgeons and uses magic-two birds with one stone."

Gungnir.name: Gungnir
Gungnir.description: "A holy spear of legend. It uses wind magic to pierce anything and return to its owner."

Heavenly Werkbau.name: Heavenly Werkbau
Heavenly Werkbau.description:
"''A bow with the divine protection of light, it reacts to and increases the might of the pure heart.
Its arrows are as dazzling as rainfall of light.''"

Heaven's Fire Axe.name: Heaven's Fire Axe
Heaven's Fire Axe.description:
"''The strength of the fire that surges out from this axe changes based on the wielder's emotions.
The axe rouses the wielder's anger and entices them to turn that anger into flames.''"

Hecatomb Axe.name: Hecatomb Axe
Hecatomb Axe.description: "An axe forged of the technology from an ancient magical civilization that annihilates evil with its sacred power."

Hell Staff.name: Hell Staff
Hell Staff.description:
"''A staff that can only be used by the ruler of hell.
It's said to reveal the true nature of others.''"

Hellfire Ignited Lance.name: Hellfire Ignited Lance
Hellfire Ignited Lance.description: "''A flame-spouting lance. Despite its cute appearance, its destruction is extraordinary, as if the embodiment of Ignis' power.''"

Holy Sword Ascalon.name: Holy Sword Ascalon
Holy Sword Ascalon.description:
"Nothing rivals the sharpness of the Ascalon.
Its blade melts everything in its path and halves enemies mercilessly."

Holy Winged Lance Enoch.name: Holy Winged Lance Enoch
Holy Winged Lance Enoch.description: "Those felled by this spear's mighty light power are greeted not by the reaper, but by a goddess."

Horae Slash.name: Horae Slash
Horae Slash.description:
"''A weapon formed with the purpose of protecting Dike's people.
One swing can cleave darkness and exorcise evil.''

Hovud Sword.name: Hovud Sword
Hovud Sword.description:
"A sword born from Heimdallr.
It chooses its wielder, and that wielder must be of hero material."

Hrotti.name: Hrotti
Hrotti.description: "This sword's name means 'thruster.' It shoots blades of high water pressure when brandished."

Inferno Crown.name: Inferno Crown
Inferno Crown.description: "''This crown belongs to the fire emperor of the other world. Wearing it burns you from within.''"
Inferno Crown.obtained: [[Creeping Flames of Madness (7th Raid Battle)|Creeping Flames of Madness]]

Ixid Blade.name: Ixid Blade
Ixid Blade.description: "''Ixion's blade. It's a dangerous weapon that can warp space and time and leave unhealable scars.''"

Jotunn Sword.name: Jotunn Sword
Jotunn Sword.description: "Those cut with the Jotunn Sword do not bleed. This frigid blade freezes all the body's cells."

Juturna Staff.name: Juturna Staff
Juturna Staff.description: "A magic staff that creates clean water. Unfortunately, that water is stolen drinking water."

Kukulkan Ax.name: Kukulkan Ax
Kukulkan Ax.description: "An executioner's axe made from Quetzalcoatl razor sharp feathers."

Kutune Shirka.name: Kutune Shirka
Kutune Shirka.description:
"A famous sword said to carry a beast within its blade.
The beast is said to be a fox, a deer, or even a dragon, but the details remain unknown."

Labrys.name: Labrys
Labrys.description:
"Perniciously pulverizing and piercing, this axe crushes and cleaves its targets in two.
Those who dare confront it learn fear with no escape."

Lava Sin.name: Lava Sin
Lava Sin.description:
"''A demonic war axe wreathed in the power of flame.
It ends any conflict in a shower of blood.''"
Lava Sin.obtained: [[Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Wrath]]

Lethal Lance Trishula.name: Lethal Lance Trishula
Lethal Lance Trishula.description: "Each blast of energy from this lance's tip holds love, wisdom and a final meaning only understood by the lance's holder."

Lightning Blade Vajra.name: Lightning Blade Vajra
Lightning Blade Vajra.description:
"A mystical blade that destroys base lusts, leaving an enlightened heart.
It emits lightning greater than even the God Destroyer and vanquishes all evil."

Lightning Drum Hammer.name: Lightning Drum Hammer
Lightning Drum Hammer.description:
"A ritual object that calls upon the lightning of the thunder gods.
Due to its shape, it is also used as a striking weapon."

Lightning Hammer Yagrush.name: Lightning Hammer Yagrush
Lightning Hammer Yagrush.description:
"Quick as lightning, its destruction is inescapable.
Yagurushi's havoc is equivalent to being banished from this world."

Lightning Laser Gun.name: Lightning Laser Gun
Lightning Laser Gun.description:
"''The cute crystals of lightning this gun shoots are as if shooting stars.
With these, it turns its victims into star dust.''"

Lightning Strike Axe.name: Lightning Strike Axe
Lightning Strike Axe.description:
"''A heavy axe that unleashes blows of exploding lightning.
With one swing, it inflicts massive damage and snatches life from all things.''"

Lion Crusher Nemea.name: Lion Crusher Nemea
Lion Crusher Nemea.description:
"Indestructible and able to smash anything, this hammer is celebrated for its hardness.
With one blow, it can cleave the earth or set forests alight."

Luna Bow.name: Luna Bow
Luna Bow.description:
"''A bow that automatically detects and tracks magic.
It is strung with a tread of light, not a bowstring.''"

Lunar Wind Crescent Axe.name: Lunar Wind Crescent Axe
Lunar Wind Crescent Axe.description: "Clad in violent winds that shred all things, this ancient axe hones its own edge with each swing."

Lyre Bow Orpheus.name: Lyre Bow Orpheus
Lyre Bow Orpheus.description:
"''This bow releases a melody of light that entrances all those nearby.
This melody is bathed in light that materializes to slash at the enemies.''"

Mag Shreft.name: Mag Shreft
Mag Shreft.description: "A magic hammer made in honor of Crom Cruach. It creates flame explosions."
Mag Shreft.obtained: Raging Fury of the Inferno Dragon

Mage Rod.name: Mage Rod
Mage Rod.description: "The staff of a mage who worshipped [[Crom Cruach]]. It shoots scorching flames."
Mage Rod.obtained: Raging Fury of the Inferno Dragon

Maris Lancea.name: Maris Lancea
Maris Lancea.description: "''A lance, originally crafted by a criminal, that turned on its creator, slaying him and becoming a demonic lance.''"
Maris Lancea.obtained: [[Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Wrath]]

Marisma Reus.name: Marisma Reus
Marisma Reus.description:
"''A hammer haunted by demon's hate.
It can be used for smashing and gouging''"
Marisma Reus.obtained: [[Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Lust]]

Marukutokariba.name: Marukutokariba
Marukutokariba.description: "''The last of its kind, this weapon is the guardian sword of the sacred tree that watched over a kingdom of great verdure where arbor grew thick.''"

Milky Way Pistol Cosmo.name: Milky Way Pistol Cosmo
Milky Way Pistol Cosmo.description: "A pistol that fires super compressed wind energy with nigh self-destructive force."

Missile Hammer.name: Missile Hammer
Missile Hammer.description: "A highly effective weapon that blows its targets to bits with the force of a missile."

Mjolnir.name: Mjolnir
Mjolnir.description:
"This weapon always finds its way back to its master's hand and possesses unyielding strength.
It is obedient as if of its own volition, but it is unruly towards everyone besides its master."

Monoceros Rod.name: Monoceros Rod
Monoceros Rod.description:
"A sacred staff that only those pure of heart can hold.
Long ago it was only for maidens, but it seems to have become more forgiving."

Morgenstern Hammer.name: Morgenstern Hammer
Morgenstern Hammer.description:
"Said to end a foe's misery before they can even feel pain,
this hammer grants the merciful release of death."

Nadeshiko Staff.name: Nadeshiko Staff
Nadeshiko Staff.description:
"''A staff containing the magic of water. Those who hold this staff
are protected by water from all attacks and can wield water freely.''"

Necronomicon.name: Necronomicon
Necronomicon.description: "''Shrouded in dark rumors, this book is about the magical secrets of the other world.''"

Nephele Mace.name: Nephele Mace
Nephele Mace.description:
"This mace is feather light in the hand, but extremely heavy the second it strikes an enemy.
Handle with care."

Norn Delta Force.name: Norn Delta Force
Norn Delta Force.description:
"''A lance that carves out destiny. It was originally a weapon mass
produced for Kamihime special forces, but few weapons survive today.''"

Nothung.name: Nothung
Nothung.description:
"''When a great sword was broken, someone stole one fragment.
Unbeknownst to the original sword, its sister sword was born.''"

Nuclear Gun Vesta.name: Nuclear Gun Vesta
Nuclear Gun Vesta.description:
"''A weapon formed with the purpose of protecting Dike's people.
One swing can cut through evil and exorcise darkness.''"

Oceanic Trident.name: Oceanic Trident
Oceanic Trident.description:
"This spear was born at the bottom of the sea where not even light can reach.
Its strength is akin to the pressure of the deep-sea waters, and its fury is akin to that of the waves."

Odin's Blaster.name: Odin's Blaster
Odin's Blaster.description: "A phantom gun that shoots out lightning that instantaniously strikes down its enemies."

Panzerfaust.name: Panzerfaust
Panzerfaust.description:
"''A weapon born of Mephistopheles' malice.
With each swing, it diminishes the heart of its user and magnifies their wickedness.''

Pearl Horn.name: Pearl Horn
Pearl Horn.description: "A horn with a blue pearl that radiates magic power. It can drown enemies in the sea."

Pegasus Lance Arion.name: Pegasus Lance Arion
Pegasus Lance Arion.description:
"A lance so light it rides the wind.
Its blows are sharp like those of knives, and its thrusts can take down birds."

Phantom Bow Soma.name: Phantom Bow Soma
Phantom Bow Soma.description:
"''A bow that shines brilliantly like the crescent moon.
The rumors say that those who carry it also gains the ability to see spirits.''"

Phantom Sword Bronllavyn.name: Phantom Sword Bronllavyn
Phantom Sword Bronllavyn.description:
"A magic sword that can extend kilometers.
It can bisect giant warships, but its weight grows with its length."

Phoenix Bow of Light.name: Phoenix Bow of Light
Phoenix Bow of Light.description:
"A bow made from the feathers of a phoenix.
It possesses the power of light and shoots dazzling arrows that purify all darkness."

Phoenix Feather Short Sword.name: Phoenix Feather Short Sword
Phoenix Feather Short Sword.description:
"A sword with the feathers of phoenix wings.
Its sharpness is godly."

Plunging Hammer Icarus.name: Plunging Hammer Icarus
Plunging Hammer Icarus.description:
"A hammer specialized for grounding airborne enemies.
It strikes down to earth those who fly and strikes down to the underworld those on earth."

Poison Blade Astaroth.name: Poison Blade Astaroth
Poison Blade Astaroth.description:
"''A sword upon which sorcery bestowed the power of Poison. its
name is reportedly borrowed from a great marchioness of the past.''"

Prism Hammer.name: Prism Hammer
Prism Hammer.description:
"An extremely destructive hammer.
It pounds its target with a series of compounded shocks."
Prism Hammer.obtained: The World Tree's Seed of Despair

Quetzal Spear.name: Quetzal Spear
Quetzal Spear.description: "A serpent-like spear. It slips through any defense like a snake, never missing its target."

Rahab Knife.name: Rahab Knife
Rahab Knife.description:
"A sword made with the tough material of [[Rahab]].
It carries the magic of water and can level buildings in one fell swoop."

Raijin's Halberd.name: Raijin's Halberd
Raijin's Halberd.description:
"A halberd sealed with the last strength of a raijin whose name is long-forgotten.
It is said that its wielder gains the guidance of thunder and lightning."

Ray Gun Solignight.name: Ray Gun Solignight
Ray Gun Solignight.description:
"Those struck by its bullets experience the heat of the sun.
It inflicts massive damage with light and heat like that of the brightest star."

Reaper Scythe.name: Reaper Scythe
Reaper Scythe.description: "''A sickle that can only be used by a god of death. Its famous for its razor sharp blade.''"

Royal Blaster.name: Royal Blaster
Royal Blaster.description: "It is said that only those who possess great love can unlock this mighty water gun's true power."

Sacred Flock Lance Vajna.name: Sacred Flock Lance Vajna
Sacred Flock Lance Vajna.description:
"A lance that creates spiraling whirls of wind.
There is nothing this eternally spiraling wind cannot penetrate."

Sacred Sword Fleuret.name: Sacred Sword Fleuret
Sacred Sword Fleuret.description:
"An ancient sword that gives off divine magic.
Those who wield it are fated to an eternal war with darkness."

Salamander Tomahawk.name: Salamander Tomahawk
Salamander Tomahawk.description: "''An axe with a fire monster's power, it can turn its surroundings into a sea of flames with one sweep, but absorbs its user's power.''"

Sandalph Wing.name: Sandalph Wing
Sandalph Wing.description: "''A sorcery tool made with Sandalphon's wings. It grants its user the same mobility as those wings.''"

Scaled Claymore.name: Scaled Claymore
Scaled Claymore.description:
"A sword fortified with [[Rahab]]'s scales fused together with special chemicals.
Its overlapping scales can tear through even tough armor."

Scorpion Axe Antares.name: Scorpion Axe Antares
Scorpion Axe Antares.description:
"A blacksmith who was always second in his craft yet strived to be the best ultimately threw his life into the furnace.
This was his last work."

Sea Draco Blast.name: Sea Draco Blast
Sea Draco Blast.description:
"A gun with a report like the howls of a sea dragon.
It packs a powerful punch but has a slow rate of fire."

Seraph Ballista.name: Seraph Ballista
Seraph Ballista.description:
"A bow within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Burst.name: Seraph Burst
Seraph Burst.description:
"A gun within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Claymore.name: Seraph Claymore
Seraph Claymore.description:
"A sword within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Halberd.name: Seraph Halberd
Seraph Halberd.description:
"An axe within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Hammer.name: Seraph Hammer
Seraph Hammer.description:
"A hammer within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Lance.name: Seraph Lance
Seraph Lance.description:
"A lance within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Orb.name: Seraph Orb
Seraph Orb.description:
"An arcane weapon within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Rod.name: Seraph Rod
Seraph Rod.description:
"A staff within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Seraph Slicer.name: Seraph Slicer
Seraph Slicer.description:
"A sword within which dwells the power of a holy angel.
Its beautiful rays grant the weapon the power of holy light and casts out external darkness."

Serpent Dragon's Staff.name: Serpent Dragon's Staff
Serpent Dragon's Staff.description: "''A staff said to once belong to a wicked serpent. Its power is said to bring about destruction.''"

Shirayamanohime.name: Shirayamanohime
Shirayamanohime.description: "A lance made from the branch of a holy tree. Its blade will protect love for all eternity."

Shocking Earthrod.name: Shocking Earthrod
Shocking Earthrod.description:
"''An ancient staff in a constant high voltage state.
Its electric current passes through the earth and kills enemies with bolts from below.''"

Skilled Archery.name: Skilled Archery
Skilled Archery.description: "A highly refined, ancient bow that soon ends the lives of those entranced by the beauty of its attacks."

Slav Tomahawk.name: Slav Tomahawk
Slav Tomahawk.description:
"''An axe said to be forged for the peoples of a seized territory to revolt.
It is good for brutish physical attacks and is both sharp and heavy.''"

Solar Bow Apollo.name: Solar Bow Apollo
Solar Bow Apollo.description: "''A bow that purifies with the power of the sun. Those who are guilty will burn, and those pure will be healed.''"

Solar Eclipse.name: Solar Eclipse
Solar Eclipse.description:
"''A sword that consumes the sun. Forged during a solar eclipse,
its body blazes with powerful flames, just as folklore says.''"

Sorceress' Staff Sabbath.name: Sorceress' Staff Sabbath
Sorceress' Staff Sabbath.description: "''Wield this staff if you dare to know what the rites of black magic constitute.''"

Staff of Orichalcos.name: Staff of Orichalcos
Staff of Orichalcos.description: "A staff made from never-warping metal. It is resistant to high temperatures and emits fire magic."

Star Wind Bow Hesperos.name: Star Wind Bow Hesperos
Star Wind Bow Hesperos.description:
"The arrows of Hesperos are glimmers of stars.
These falling stars rocket through the wind and pierce enemies in the blink of an eye."

Stealth Crown.name: Stealth Crown
Stealth Crown.description: "A magic invisibility helmet, it makes for a handy weapon for when you're up to no good."

Sturm Rifle.name: Sturm Rifle
Sturm Rifle.description:
"''A perfectly accurate magic gun with the power of a wind demon.
It delivers swift justice to evildoers.''"
Sturm Rifle.obtained: [[Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Lust]]

Sun Staff Summersol.name: Sun Staff Summersol
Sun Staff Summersol.description: "A staff with the scorching heat of the sun, it was made by Sol for the beach."

Surfing Axe.name: Surfing Axe
Surfing Axe.description:
"A weapon using [[Oceanus]]'s surfboard.
It is originally a surfboard for Kamihime only, and its destructive forces are exceptional."

Svaldish Axe.name: Svaldish Axe
Svaldish Axe.description:
"A war axe customized by [[Svarog]],
it's capable of producing incredible amounts of heat."

Sword of Brightness Collbrande.name: Sword of Brightness Collbrande
Sword of Brightness Collbrande.description:
"A magic sword that emits glaring light when charged with magic.
This light cuts through darkness and illuminates the future."

Sword of Enragement.name: Sword of Enragement
Sword of Enragement.description:
"''Those who first behold this sword are captivated by its beauty - so
much so that they do not realize their bodies have been frozen in ice.''"

Sword of Kusanagi.name: Sword of Kusanagi
Sword of Kusanagi.description:
"A sword of thunder that emerged from the tail of a great serpent larger than a mountain.
Its sharpness is otherworldly, and no other weapon can withstand this sword."

Tezcatl Hammer.name: Tezcatl Hammer
Tezcatl Hammer.description: "''A tough jaguar hammer with the strenght of a beast and the agility of a cat.''"

Thunder Staff Yurlungur.name: Thunder Staff Yurlungur
Thunder Staff Yurlungur.description:
"A staff sealed with the power of a thunder-wielding serpent, whose power still rages within it.
Those disposed to lightning cannot even touch it."

Thunderous Ukko Axe.name: Thunderous Ukko Axe
Thunderous Ukko Axe.description:
"An axe containing the force of world-smashing storms.
Those dealt its blow experience a cataclysmic shock."

Thundrous Warhammer.name: Thundrous Warhammer
Thundrous Warhammer.description:
"A giant hammer crafted by a thunder god who poured within it the entirety of their power.
Though tremendously heavy, it grants its user the power of the thunder god."

Triple Blade.name: Triple Blade
Triple Blade.description: "A blade that embodies the fury of the sun. Its divine rage can cut through a blizzard."

Uranus Slice.name: Uranus Slice
Uranus Slice.description:
"''An axe that absorbs the star' power to increase its might.
It requires proper skill from its holder.''"

Vada Blade.name: Vada Blade
Vada Blade.description: "A sword that controls water. The water looks beautiful, but is actually evil."

Vajra Trident Sword.name: Vajra Trident Sword
Vajra Trident Sword.description:
"''A legendary sword said to eradicate evil and hack apart earthly desires and fate
Accompanied with hellfire it excludes a presence of that of a fierce god.''"

Vanadi Shot.name: Vanadi Shot
Vanadi Shot.description: "A special gun that shoots guided, star-shaped blasts."

Vedr Feather.name: Vedr Feather
Vedr Feather.description: "''A thunder sword made from the sharp wings of Vedfolnir who lives in Yggdrasil.''"
Vedr Feather.obtained: The World Tree's Seed of Despair

Victoria Gun.name: Victoria Gun
Victoria Gun.description: "This gun was transformed when Nike's magic was unleashed. It uses rapid fire water magic."

Vritra Hammer.name: Vritra Hammer
Vritra Hammer.description: "A hydrolic hammer with a power amplifying mechanism."

War Hammer Leo.name: War Hammer Leo
War Hammer Leo.description:
"A token made by humans to protect humans.
It is said to have been presented to a great knight by a great king and is a testament to honor."

Water Blade Bazelaud.name: Water Blade Bazelaud
Water Blade Bazelaud.description:
"A magic sword cherished by a royal family that perished in a great flood.
It holds great water power and absorbs power from its victim's shrieks."

Water Hammer Anahit.name: Water Hammer Anahit
Water Hammer Anahit.description:
"A hammer modeled with great wisdom and the blessing of water.
The water ripples this weapon creates move according to the wielder's will."

Wheel Axe.name: Wheel Axe
Wheel Axe.description: "''An axe used to torture convicts. It uses rotating energy for a powerful blast.''"

Wheellock Gale Gun.name: Wheellock Gale Gun
Wheellock Gale Gun.description: "By furiously spinning lethal winds within itself, the might of each shot of this ancient gun is greatly amplified."

White Hole.name: White Hole
White Hole.description: "''A relic of a lost technology. It shoots out light swallowed by super massive black holes.''"

Wind Staff Anemoi.name: Wind Staff Anemoi
Wind Staff Anemoi.description: "''A staff with the might of a strong gale. Depending on its handler. it can conjure breezes to shredding winds.''"

Winged Staff Raviel.name: Winged Staff Raviel
Winged Staff Raviel.description:
"A staff with purifying powers so great they can turn villains into saints with a touch.
Few can master its use."

Winged Sword Suparna.name: Winged Sword Suparna
Winged Sword Suparna.description:
"A weapon created through the application of both science and magic.
Made with advanced technology, it gleams like a gem when attacking."

Witch Broom.name: Witch Broom
Witch Broom.description:
"A costume witch broom altered for Michael's personal use.
Using it affects the weather."

Yggdra Xyston.name: Yggdra Xyston
Yggdra Xyston.description: "''A high-voltage, lethal thunder lance made from the Yggdrasill machine.''"
Yggdra Xyston.obtained: The World Tree's Seed of Despair

Yggdrasil Bow.name: Yggdrasil Bow
Yggdrasil Bow.description:
"''Yggdrasil Bow A thunder bow made from the wood of Yggdrasil.
Its arrows have superb penetrative power.''"
Yggdrasil Bow.obtained: The World Tree's Seed of Despair

Zantetsuken.name: Zantetsuken
Zantetsuken.description:
"A sword tempered with the magic of light.
With its weight alone, it can pulverise solid steel into jelly."

Zephyr Bow of Gales.name: Zephyr Bow of Gales
Zephyr Bow of Gales.description:
"''This bow cocoons its wielder in a gentle, warm breeze.
Its arrows, however, take on strong gales and delivers powerful blows.''"
